About.title: Keven Goulart
About.subtitle: Full-Stack Developer
About.presentation: Hello! I am looking for an opportunity to grow as a professional. I work as a developer specialized in TypeScript, Node.js, React, Next.js, and Nest.js among other technologies.
About.experience: I have experience in developing complete applications, working on both the front-end and back-end, focusing on scalable and well-structured solutions.

Presentation.description: Hello! My name is Kéven Goulart Medeiros, and I work as a developer specializing in TypeScript, Node.js, React, Next.js, and Nest. I have experience in building full-stack applications, working on both front-end and back-end development, with a focus on scalable and well-structured solutions

ProjectsClassic.title: Projects
ProjectsClassic.geeklogDescription: A social platform I developed for reviewing and sharing different types of media — such as movies, series, books, and games — with friends
ProjectsClassic.otherProjectsDescription: You can check out my other projects on my GitHub profile.
